adDetails: We Can Do it ! ..... Our Cleaning Services is based on the belief that our customers' needs are of the utmost importance. Our entire team is committed to meeting those needs. As a result, a high percentage of our business is from repeat customers and referrals. Let us help you Deep Cleaning MOVE OUT/IN SERVICE >Empty all trash containers Kitchen Clean the Microwave, Stove & Cabinets= Exterior/Interior.(drip pans cleaned also). Countertops,Faucets cleaned Santaized & Disinfected. Mop & Sweep Floor Bathrooms Clean Toilets Interior and Exterior, Clean Tub &Shower stalls. Clean all exterior/interior cabinets. Clean all Mirrors, Faucets, Sweep & Mop Floors Bedrooms Rooms are to be Swept and Mopped or Vacuum. Closets cleaned in all rooms Living & Family Rooms Floors are to be Swept and Mopped or Vacuum. Closets cleanmed CLEANED in ALL ROOMS eiling fans, light fixtures and all baseboards through out the house will be cleaned. All the woodwork through the house including doors, frames paneling, wiped down. All Cob Webs removed Special Request Cleaning can be done for an Extra Fee We are prepared to work until the job is complete ... FLAT RATE PRICES
